title: Personal Task Manager
description: A full-stack task management app with user authentication, due date reminders, and cloud storage.

title: Real-Time Data Dashboard
description: A dashboard displaying live data using APIs, interactive charts, and real-time analytics.

title: Resume Keyword Analyzer
description: An AI-powered tool that analyzes resumes and suggests keyword optimizations based on job descriptions.

title: Serverless URL Shortener
description: A cloud-based URL shortener with analytics tracking using AWS Lambda and DynamoDB.
